Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Sarovar Portico Ahmedabad places you in the heart of Ahmedabad, convenient to Manek Chowk and Sanskar Kendra Museum. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Jama Masjid Mosque and Swaminarayan Temple.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 69 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a garden. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Sarovar Portico Ahmedabad.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Ahmedabad? This hotel has 3778 square feet (351 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Sarovar Portico Ahmedabad.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Sarovar Portico Ahmedabad places you in the heart of Ahmedabad, convenient to Manek Chowk and Sanskar Kendra Museum. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Jama Masjid Mosque and Swaminarayan Temple.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Manek Chowk - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Sanskar Kendra Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Jama Masjid Mosque - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Swaminarayan Temple - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Sardar Patel Stadium - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Hathi Singh Temple - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Sidi Bashir Mosque and the Shaking Minarets - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Naginawadi - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Gujarat University - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Gandhi Ashram - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Gulmohar Park Mall - 6.4 km / 4 mi
ISCON Mall - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Adalaj Vav - 15.8 km / 9.8 mi
Swaminarayan Complex - 25.1 km / 15.6 mi
Lothal - 65.2 km / 40.5 mi

The preferred airport for Sarovar Portico Ahmedabad is Ahmedabad (AMD-Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Intl.) - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Sarovar Portico Ahmedabad is Ahmedabad (AMD-Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Intl.) - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi.
